bug.author: znation
bug.description:
As I scroll down (and hit the bottom):
First, the scrollbar hits bottom and the last visible row (99) appears at the bottom. This seems fine. A half second or so later, the scrollbar jumps (which is fine), and the rows jump (row 99 is now up a couple from where it was) - this part seems like a bug. Briefly in between, it jumps to about row 138 (then back to 91). This also seems like a bug.
See video for repro: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/files/1891680/explore_scroll_repro_small.zip>explore_scroll_repro_small.zip</denchmark-link>
